message: When you want something that badly. Do it, explain later. Hats off to her. Nobody really cares, that's just nature. So what. I remember this one woman wanted to finish a marathon so badly she defecated near the finish line. That was poop and she was praised for her determination. This isn't and everybody jumps to shame her for doing it. Why? That's the real why. I don't understand.

Why prove his point?

Washington â€” In one of his first official acts as president, Barack Obama has overturned a controversial executive order in which former President George W. Bush limited public access to presidential records. The order, No. 13233, was issued by Mr. Bush in 2001. It expanded the power of current and former chief executives â€” and their heirs â€” to restrict access to their official records. Last year the U.S. House of Representatives passed legislation that would have gutted the order, but the measure ran into resistance in the Senate. The House took up the issue again this month.
